Description.Name: Topsy-Turvy Volcanic Eruption
Description.Details: This planet is experiencing a volcanic eruption near the OZ, which is causing a wide variety of benefits. First, the volcanic ash improves vision and sensor range by 35%. Additionally, the ash is also super-cooled and sinks 10 bonus heat on all units per turn as well as improving heat sinking by 20%. Finally, the ash improves targeting systems, inflicting a +2 accuracy bonus on all attacks.
